dialog.title: Hey there! üëã
dialog.body1: I'm so glad you stopped by! This is my little corner of the web where I share my projects, ideas, and passion for frontend development.
dialog.body2: Feel free to explore, and if you have any questions or just want to chat about code, design, or anything else,

home.headline: Frontend Developer ¬∑ Building products that users love
home.intro: I transform complex requirements into clean, accessible, and performant interfaces. Specialized in Vue 2/3, TypeScript, and Nuxt, with real production experience in insurtech, edtech, and personal SaaS projects.
home.uiDevDesc: Building intuitive, accessible interfaces with Vue, Vuetify, and modern component patterns.
home.performanceDesc: Optimizing applications for speed with Nuxt 3, lazy loading, and efficient state management.
home.legacyMigrationDesc: Modernizing legacy code to Vue 3 + TypeScript while maintaining business continuity.
home.fullStackDesc: Integrating APIs, working with Supabase/PHP backends, and deploying to Vercel.
home.ctaSubtitle: Let's collaborate and build something great together.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a frontend developer with hands‚Äëon experience building product interfaces and migrating legacy systems. I enjoy turning complex requirements into clear, accessible, and fast UIs using Vue 2/3, TypeScript, and Nuxt.
about.ebrokerDesc: Worked in a Scrum team maintaining and enhancing a high-complexity insurance pricing tool. Implemented business logic and user interfaces using Vue 2 and TypeScript. Developed frontend unit tests and integrated REST APIs in close collaboration with backend teams.
about.checkponDesc: Designed user interfaces and navigation flows for an image verification platform. Collaborated with the development team on technical feasibility and created the design system and visual identity.
about.evolmindDesc: Developing and maintaining a production educational platform using Vue 3 and TypeScript. Migrating legacy PHP/jQuery code to modern frontend architecture. Optimizing frontend components for performance and scalability. Working within agile SCRUM environment.
about.breviolinkDesc: Built a complete URL shortener and bio pages SaaS from scratch. Implemented authentication with Supabase, real-time analytics, Stripe subscriptions, and Row Level Security. Deployed on Vercel.
about.howIWorkIntro: Clean code, clear communication, and user focus. I rely on:
about.beyondWork1: üåç I love immersive travel, local city events, üìö reading, and üé¨ cinema (Tim Burton and Christopher Nolan fan; favorite movie: Contact by Robert Zemeckis ‚Äî and during the holidays I still enjoy the classic cheesy ones). üíô Ravenclaw spirit, curious and adventurous. I prefer ‚ôüÔ∏è board games, enjoy chess, and creating a home around my people.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of personal projects showcasing my frontend development skills.

breviolink.title: BrevioLink
breviolink.summary: URL shortener & bio pages with analytics, auth, and Stripe subscriptions.
breviolink.description: A full-featured SaaS application offering URL shortening and customizable bio pages ("link in bio"). Includes real-time click analytics, user authentication, and Stripe-powered Pro subscriptions.

ecommerce.title: Headless E-Commerce Storefront
ecommerce.summary: Fast storefront with product catalog, cart, and Stripe checkout.
ecommerce.description: A modern storefront showcasing SSR, caching, and a delightful cart experience. Emphasis on accessibility and performance budgets.
highlights: SSR product listing and detail pages

verifier.title: Image Provenance Verifier
verifier.summary: Practical demo to inspect EXIF, hashes, and simple tamper signals.
verifier.description: A learning project to explore image integrity. Extracts EXIF metadata, computes hashes, and highlights potential changes.

learning.title: Learning Hub ‚Äì Quizzes & Progress
learning.summary: Mini-LMS with modules, quizzes, progress tracking, and admin authoring.
learning.description: A focused education hub with lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking. Includes an admin area for content authoring.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Feel free to reach out!
